publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4762# Ms Sandra White: Millennium Cup Winners—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow’s Universal Football Club on its achievement in winning the 2006 Millennium Cup and its involvement in the Scottish Unity League, a football league set up in Glasgow to create an atmosphere free from prejudice and discrimination by bringing together players from different racial and religious backgrounds and acknowledges the success which these initiatives have in promoting a true multicultural Scotland. Supported by: Linda Fabiani*, Alex Neil*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Fergus Ewing*, Christine Grahame*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*

S2M-4762# Ms Sandra White: Millennium Cup Winners—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow’s Universal Football Club on its achievement in winning the 2006 Millennium Cup and its involvement in the Scottish Unity League, a football league set up in Glasgow to create an atmosphere free from prejudice and discrimination by bringing together players from different racial and religious backgrounds and acknowledges the success which these initiatives have in promoting a true multicultural Scotland. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Rob Gibson, Eleanor Scott, Fergus Ewing, Christine Grahame, Mrs Nanette Milne, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Tommy Sheridan*, Shiona Baird*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Ms Maureen Watt*
S2M-4762# Millennium Cup Winners (lodged on 7 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4762# Millennium Cup Winners (lodged on 7 September 2006) Trish Godman*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4762# Millennium Cup Winners (lodged on 7 September 2006) Dr Jean Turner*, Dennis Canavan*
